Albania.Q1: The Albanian language is one of the oldest living languages in the world, with roots dating back to ancient times.
Albania.Q2: Albania is often referred to as the 'Land of the Eagles' due to its national symbol, the golden eagle. These majestic birds are not only part of the country's emblem but are also protected and celebrated in Albanian culture.
